original_title: Buzzcocks: Live at The Shepherd's Bush Empire
overview: The Buzzcocks filmed live at the Shepherds Bush Empire in 2003. Tracks include: 'Boredom', 'Fast Cars', 'I Don't Mind', 'Love Battery', 'Autonomy', 'Harmony in My Head' and 'Sitting Around at Home'.
title: Buzzcocks: Live at The Shepherd's Bush Empire
